subject: UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Atlético Madrid got the better of its Spanish rival Barcelona on Wednesday as Koke’s early goal guided the team to a 1-0 home win and a berth in the Champions League semifinals with a 2-1 aggregate victory.
snippet: Atlético Madrid got the better of its Spanish rival Barcelona on Wednesday as Koke’s early goal guided the team to a 1-0 home win and a berth in the Champions League semifinals with a 2-1 aggregate victory.
